summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 14.1°C) and outside temperature (down 11.3°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and cloud levels (up 422 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; cold temperatures are forecasted. Also, dry and less humid conditions and winds should remain light. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and the light is absent. Weather could become unsettled.
